description.displayText: Kimberly is a very caring person and has a lot of patience particularly for the elderly and the young.  She has worked with the with elderly since high school and was a sought after caretaker in the area. It was amazing to watch her care for and have an attachment to people that were 70-80 years her senior. She is compassionate and very attentive, she treats all of her patients as if they are family.  She would be an asset to any family looking for elder care and/or day care.
